attributes.action: we should electronically limit the maximum  speed to 90- 100 mph on all new vehicles in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically If This Came To Law, It Be Much Less Traffic Crime And Crashes On The Roads Today. Nothing Wrong With Electronically Limiting The Maximum Speed To 90 Or 100mph.If You Do Have A Car That Goes Over 100mph.Go To A Racing Track!! .Not A Public Road.
